title: POC Supreme Rain Jacket packs in ultralight 3-layer waterproof cycling protection at
content:
POC’s new Supreme Rain Jacket claims the relatively rare mix of ultralight weight, maximized breathability, and the full weather protection of a true 3-layer membrane fabric. Most super-packable, fully waterproof rain jackets tend to compromise on comfort, but POC assures that the Supreme’s innovative material ensures you won’t overheat while trying to stay dry. POC […]

The post POC Supreme Rain Jacket packs in ultralight 3-layer waterproof cycling protection at <90g appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
